oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Col. Samuel F. Gray, 49th Ohio Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. Samuel F. Gray, 49th Ohio Inf. Regt., USA took over command of the regiment after Col. William H. Gibson was killed at the Battle of Stones River. Gray commanded the regiment until the end of the war.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gray, Col. Samuel F.
